RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIZMO'S MISSION made the lead soon after the start, set the pace under a firm hold while nicely rated into the stretch and drew clear under right handed urging. ALTAIR stalked the pace into the stretch, had a mild late rally inside and finished well clear for second. MR LAOBAN chased the winner in the four path and faded in the stretch. KILLER BEE slow early, found his best stride late inside. I'M NO SLEEPY JOE close up along the inside, was through after a half. PASION AZTECA failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm No Sleepy Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Gizmo's Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, nicely rated, drew clear, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Killer Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Altair
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mild rally inside, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 25. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners Since October 25, 2022 Preferred)(Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAD LITTLE BEAST dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch, dug in under right handed urging to make the lead inside the furlong marker and edged clear late under strong handling. LOCK ON pressed the early pace three wide, gained a narrow advantage midway on the turn, set the pace until deep stretch then finished second best. APACHE with the second flight two wide, fanned out five wide in upper stretch and finished with good courage. BLUE SKY'S ABOVE battled for the lead along the inside until deep stretch then faded. GAMBLER had good early speed along the inside and failed to respond. BEASTFROMTHEEAST offered a mild bid four wide into the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Little Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, dug in, right handed urging, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Apache
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 2 wide, finished well 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3wide, narrow lead turn, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ORBIT MARS showed early speed to duel on the lead, settled off the pace into the turn, re-rallied turning for home and drew clear down the lane. SHELLEY'S GEM tracked the leaders from a clear pocket through the turn, was set to a drive midway on the bend and made a steady advance down the stretch to gain the place. JOAN'S WAY slow early to trail the field into the stretch and closed well belatedly to be gaining ground late. BACKSPLASH reserved off the early pace, commenced a five wide rally in the turn and continued grinding down the outside through the stretch. SIERRA DIAMOND stalked the pace to the turn, rallied up to take the lead in upper stretch, bobbled in mid-stretch causing the rider to lose his right stirrup, was gathered up and finished evenly. DON'T LOSE HOPE broke a step slow, raced up to be mid-pack early and went evenly as a non-threat. STORM CHARGING unhurried early, moved up three wide in the turn and failed to sustain his rally. SOFIA STRONG rushed up to the lead down the backside, set a pressured pace for a half mile and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Shelley's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, long drive, steady advance

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, led, bobbled stretch, lost irons

ENTRY.NAME: Orbit Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: duel early, settled, came again, drew clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Joe B. Mulholland Jr., John P.Mulholland & Karen Mulhollan

ENTRY.NAME: Sofia Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, set pressured pace, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Charging
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rally turn, failed to sustain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 46. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRULY INCLUSIVE stalked the pace to midway on the turn from the fence, angled out three wide turning for home to engage the leaders, dueled through the lane and narrowly prevailed at the wire. DANCE DRAMA prompted the pace through the turn, took a brief lead in upper stretch, dug-in gamely when engaged by the winner and just missed in a good effort. SWEET AS MERRIE set a pressured pace to the top of the lane, responded when challenged in upper stretch but could not go with the top pair while clearly much the best of the rest. TITEBLUEJEANS travelled one-paced along the rail while failing to menace. TWILIGHT BEAUTY raced prominently from five wide into the turn and faded. HAUGHTY PRAISE the rider lost the crop turning for home while racing as a non-factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance Drama
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, brief lead, battled gamely, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Truly Inclusive
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3 wide, dueled stretch, prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIER ONE reserved off the pace into the turn, saved ground along the fence to the head of the lane, angled out splitting rivals in upper stretch and closed determinedly to gain the victory. FAST CLIP stalked the pace into the turn, rallied three wide to engage the leader turning for home, took a brief lead in mid-stretch and finished willingly to be second best. MAN'S CHOICE unhurried early, circled the field turning for home and closed well on the far outside to be gaining late. WILDCAT PRIDE prompted the early pace, was taken in hand to settle off the pace down the backside, rallied three wide to take the lead in the lane and was outkicked coming home. I STRONG unhurried racing off the pace from six wide down the backstretch and made a mild bid in the lane. BUCKEYE CHARLIE tracked the pace from five wide through the turn and failed to mount a rally. ORFANO trailed early on and passed tiring rivals in the stretch. BUCKEYE RED well placed in striking distance for a half mile and faded in the lane. YOU'RE OUT was never a threat. BAD BOY BOOGIE flashed speed up the fence to set the pace for a half and stopped in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, settled in hand, rally 3w, led, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Man's Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, circled field, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Tier One
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, saved ground, split rivals, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Clip
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, early bid, brief lead, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DISCLOSURE stalked the pace into the far turn, rallied up the inside turning for home, drifted out down the lane but kept on determinedly to prevail by the shortest of margins. AULD LANGE SYNE prompted the pace down the backstretch and through the turn, assumed command from five wide in upper stretch, dueled with the winner to the wire and was out-nodded. BLUEGRASS PARKWAY unhurried early to be near the rear of the field and mounted a late rally to gain the show. CUMBER tracked the pace through the final bend and went evenly failing to mount a closing bid. WAR NOVEL took command to open a clear lead in the first turn, stayed well off the fence while setting the pace down the backside and through the final turn and weakened in the lane. SURF AND TURF was never a threat. THE STEWARDS POSTED AN INQUIRY INTO THE STRETCH RUN AND UPON REVIEW MADE NO CHANGE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rally inside, drifted out, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Bluegrass Parkway
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late rally, gained show

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, assumed command, dueled, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Consid ered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS took the lead from the gate, opened a clear advantage down the backside, widened in upper stretch and kept-on through the lane unchallenged. CHANEL SPIRIT crowded at the start, stalked the pace from two wide down the backside, mounted a bid in the far turn, could not go with the winner but finished willingly to be second best. LADY JASPER reserved off the pace while travelling four wide, circled tiring rivals in the final bend, angled in toward the rail in upper stretch and made a mild rally to gain the show. SEEYOUINMOTOWN slow early to trail in the first turn, gained ground while wide turning for home and closed ground late. GOODNESS SAKES well placed tracking the leaders into the far turn, mounted a rally leaving the three-eighths pole and flattened out in the lane. I'M JAC'D tracked the pace from the fence to the far turn and faded. STATE OF GRACE was never a factor. WHYNAUGHTY raced mid-pack along the rail down the backside and gave way coming home.

ENTRY.NAME: Chanel Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start, stalked pace, bid, not enough, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Goodness Sakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, tracked, middle move, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasper
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, circled 4w, angled in, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Seeyouinmotown
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled wide, gaining late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHOWTIME BOY set the pace under pressure through the turn, repelled the challengers turning for home to shake clear and drew off convincingly in the lane. EL SORDO reserved off the pace while racing along the rail saving ground and closed willingly in the lane to be second best. MAILS HERE slow early to trail the field to the quarter pole, angled four wide and mounted a belated rally in the stretch to be up for the show. STORMED OUT well placed to be in striking distance late in the turn, made a brief bid in upper stretch and finished evenly. MILAGRO DE JOVANNI tracked the leaders from three wide in the turn and flattened out in the lane. SAMURAI WAY prompted the pace into the turn, ranged up to challenge the winner at the quarter pole and weakened in upper stretch. ROUGE TU RICHES broke wide leaving the gate and never posed a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Showtime Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, shook clear, convincingly

ENTRY.NAME: El Sordo
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, saved ground, closed willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Stormed Out
ENTRY.OWNER: Born To Run Farm and Cline Robert C
